settings.title: How Do I Contact Your Customer Service Team?
settings.infos:
In case of any questions, concerns, or trouble with your order, you can always reach us at the following:
Call Us At:

1.) +91 7290052554 (IND)
2.) +1 (930) 205-2554 (US)
3.) +44 (203) 287-9415 (UK)
4.) +61 (280) 069-415 (AUS)


Email Us At: info@kalkifashion.com
For Returns and Cancellation Email Us At: claims@kalkifashion.com
Live Chat with us through our Website : https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=919920012474


Message Us On:
For any queries - WhatsApp: +91 9920012474
